mcq.statement: Which battle during the Second Anglo-Sikh War is considered one of the bloodiest fought by the British East India Company?
mcq.one_liner: The Battle of **Chillianwala** is regarded as one of the bloodiest battles fought by the British East India Company during the Second Anglo-Sikh War.
